Package org.pixel.ext.ecs

Class Sprite

java.lang.Object
org.pixel.ext.ecs.GameObjectContainer
org.pixel.ext.ecs.GameObject
org.pixel.ext.ecs.Sprite
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, org.pixel.commons.lifecycle.Disposable, org.pixel.commons.lifecycle.Updatable, Attachable<GameObjectContainer>, org.pixel.graphics.SpriteDrawable
public class Sprite
extends GameObject
Positional sprite game object.
